title: Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: STEM-Integrated e-Learning Design for Creative Thinking Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental STEM concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform creative problem-solving projects three or more times using an integrated STEM approach.
Learners can apply engineering design processes with over 80% accuracy using simulation tools in an e-learning environment.
Learners can produce two or more creative outputs incorporating peer evaluation and feedback via digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
